page.title: 16CHRISTCHURCH,BARNSTON
page.content:
{AN INTERVIEW WITH OUR VICAR In Barnston Church there are many organizations.They are; { {Cubs Scouts Guides Brownies { Beavers {Sunday School Pathfinders
Meetings are held in the old school house and many children belong to the clubs.The only club for grown-ups at Christchurch is{Young Wives.} Church services are on most days of the week and they include weddings, funerals and christenings.In a year there are about 100 funerals,30 weddings and 30 christenings. Our Vicar often helps Parishioners. When someone is ill he goes to the hospital to talk to and comfort them. He can have as many holidays as he wants.
